snippet: President Obama has stepped up his fund-raising pace in anticipation of running against Mitt Romney, whose campaign said it plans to raise as much as $600 million for the fall race.
abstract: President Obama has stepped up his fund-raising pace in anticipation of running against Mitt Romney, whose campaign said it plans to raise as much as $600 million for the fall race.

headline.main: $53 Million Raised in March by Obama and Democratic Party
